summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- The "How It Works" page failed the performance test with a loading time of 915ms. It is recommended to investigate the cause of this delay and optimize the page to improve its loading time.
insights: The homepage, pricing page, and blog page have fast load times, which is a positive sign for user experience.
The "How It Works" page needs optimization to improve its loading time and pass the performance test.
Further investigation and optimization of all pages can help improve overall user experience and reduce bounce rates.
